page.title: 16CLOTHES WORN IN GT. WAKERING
page.content: MY FAMILY AND I ALL WEAR DIFFERENT TYPES OF CLOTHING.MY SISTER MAINLY WEARS SCHOOL UNIFORM FOR KING EDMUND'S SCHOOL WHICH IS GREEN, GREY OR BLACK SKIRT, WHITE BLOUSE AND GREEN JUMPER. FOR WORK MY DAD WEARS A WHITE SHIRT AND GREY JUMPER, TROUSERS AND JACKET AS HE IS A CHAUFFEUR. AT HOME HE WEARS OLD CLOTHES FOR WORKING IN THE GARAGE AND A SUIT FOR GOING OUT ON SPECIAL OCCASIONS. MY MUM WEARS SKIRTS AND T-SHIRTS AND FOR SPECIAL OCCASIONS SHE WEARS SUITS OR DRESSES. THE LATEST FASHION IN 1985 IS BAGGY JEANS, LEATHER TIES, STRING VESTS AND SWEAT BANDS. MY CLOTHES ARE ALRIGHT I SUPPOSE BUT I AM VERY FUSSY ABOUT WHAT I WEAR AND IF I ASK MY MUM ITS HOPELESS BECAUSE EVERYTHING SHE CHOOSES I DON'T LIKE. I GET MY CLOTHES FROM SOUTHEND.
